selectedIDs - Variable in class junit.textui.SelectiveTestRunner
Array containing selected test numbers.
selectedNames - Variable in class junit.textui.SelectiveTestRunner
Array containing the names of selected tests.
SelectionResultPrinter - Class in junit.textui
Test listener and printer which tracks test case numbers, and provides facilities for storing outputs, tracing instrumented test cases, and diffing outputs.
SelectionResultPrinter() - Constructor for class junit.textui.SelectionResultPrinter
Default constructor, creates a result printer which directs output to stdout and has no special configuration.
SelectionResultPrinter(Writer, String, Differencer, JUnitEventDispatcher) - Constructor for class junit.textui.SelectionResultPrinter
Creates a result printer with specified configuration.
SelectionTestListener - Interface in junit.framework
Interface extension which indicates that a test listener provides mechanisms to impose a numeric ordering on tests.
SelectionTestResult - Class in junit.framework
A test result which imposes a numbered ordering on the tests which it is asked to run and provides services for selecting and prioritizing (changing the order) running of tests.
SelectionTestResult() - Constructor for class junit.framework.SelectionTestResult
A selecting test result with no criteria for selection isn't very useful.
SelectionTestResult(int[], boolean, boolean, boolean) - Constructor for class junit.framework.SelectionTestResult
Creates a selection test result that selects tests by number.
SelectionTestResult(String[], boolean, boolean, boolean) - Constructor for class junit.framework.SelectionTestResult
Creates a selection test result that selects tests by name.
SelectionTestSuite - Class in junit.framework
Extension of TestSuite to enable test selection and prioritization at the test class level.
SelectionTestSuite(TestSuite) - Constructor for class junit.framework.SelectionTestSuite
Constructs a SelectionTestSuite from the given TestSuite.
SelectiveTestRunner - Class in junit.textui
A command line based tool to run selected tests, prioritize test selection, support tracing of instrumented subjects, and perform automatic differencing between test runs.

Constructs a SelectiveTestRunner.

U

ufg - Variable in class junit.textui.SelectiveTestRunner
Module which generates a universe file which can be used to run the tests in the test suite in the same order as the current run (in a less efficient manner).
UniverseFileGenerator - Class in junit.extensions
Generates a universe file that can be used to run the same set of tests one at a time (a less efficient method).
UniverseFileGenerator(String) - Constructor for class junit.extensions.UniverseFileGenerator
Creates a universe file generator which will write to the given file.
UnixShellDifferencer - Class in junit.runner
An implementation of Differencer which uses the Unix command 'cmp -s' to diff the two files.

Constructs a UnixShellDifferencer.
UnixShellDifferencer(String) - Constructor for class junit.runner.UnixShellDifferencer
Constructs a UnixShellDifferencer, which uses the specified directory as the target for differencing.
